Class PNBottomRightController

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class PNBottomRightController
extends PNBottomRightModel

    Karel Hala

      • joinVariablesWithOperator

        public java.lang.String joinVariablesWithOperator(java.lang.String leftVariable,
                                         java.lang.String operator,
                                         java.lang.String rightVariable)
        Join left variable and right variable over operator.
        Parameters:
        leftVariable - string from jcombobox.
        operator - string from operator input.
        rightVariable - string from jcombobox.
        Returns:
        joined strings.

      • joinGuardString

        public java.lang.String joinGuardString(java.lang.String guardString,
                               java.lang.String glue,
                               java.lang.String leftVariable,
                               java.lang.String rightVariable,
                               java.lang.String operator)
        Join variables over operator to guard string over glue. If glue is null, replace guard string.
        Parameters:
        guardString - old guard string.
        glue - glue wchich will be used to join old guard with new settings [&&,||].
        leftVariable - variable or constant on left side.
        rightVariable - variable or constant on right side.
        operator - this will be used to join left and right variable. Basic operator, if new one is empty, is "==".
        Returns:
        new guard string joined by glue string.

      • createActionPanel

        public void createActionPanel(ActionModel oldAction)
        Create panel with action to be set. Panel is shown in dialog window, it containt variable JcomboBox and Jtext field.
        Parameters:
        oldAction - ActionModel to be shown as default value.
